problems.problem: Users seek effective, accessible natural remedies for acne scars, dark spots and fine lines (e.g., aloe vera) but may be unsure about efficacy and use
Unclear instructions for DIY face masks: what ingredients to combine or avoid, correct application time and rinsing procedure
Need for clearer diet guidance related to skin (which foods to avoid like sugar/refined carbs and how hydration/coffee affect skin)
Confusion and safety concerns around cold therapy (ice water) vs. cleansing order — risk of trapping dirt if pores are tightened first
Unclear everyday skincare habit guidance (when to wash, avoid popping pimples, not touching face, not sleeping/exercising with makeup, and avoiding product overload)
